extends android.app.Activity
    This activity handles the user's login.

      • goToSignUp

        public void goToSignUp(android.view.View view)
        Called when the user presses on "Create Account".

        This method is used to show the sign up panel on the Login page.

        Parameters:
        view - "Create Account" text view

      • goToLogin

        public void goToLogin(android.view.View view)
        Called when the user presses on "Login".

        This method is used to show the login panel on the Login page.

        Parameters:
        view - "Login" text view

      • goToMain

        public void goToMain()
        Called when the user presses the "Login" or "Sign Up" button.

        This method is used to send the user to the Main page.

      • login

        public void login(android.view.View view)
        Called when the user presses the "Login" button.

        This method is used to check if the username exists in the webserver. If it exists, it stores the user information into USERLOGIN and directs the user to the Main page. Otherwise, it shows an error message.

        Parameters:
        view - "Login" button

      • signUp

        public void signUp(android.view.View view)
        Called when the user presses the "Sign Up" button.

        This method is used to check if the username is unique. If the username is unique, it will create a new user. Otherwise, it shows an error message.

        Parameters:
        view - "Sign Up" button
